website_summaries.verdict: If you need support but are bored with sporty designs, this is the sandal for you.
pros: Combines comfort and a touch of edgy style
Synthetic, satin-lined strap with metal logo detail, quilted foam footbed
Anatomical arch support and flexible, rubber sponge outsole
cons: Some report these sandals are a bit slick and that they absorb water

customer_reviews.title: Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife. She says that it is really comfortable but it started to peel and fall apart in no time at all.
customer_reviews.author: Christian R.

customer_reviews.title: Sized too small
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are cute, but they are sized small. I ordered my normal size 6 and my heel was nearly hanging off the back. They are also very narrow! I returned mine and I hesitate to order the next size up because of the narrow fit.
customer_reviews.author: LittleJen33

customer_reviews.title: I love these but had to reorder a size up
customer_reviews.text: I love these but had to reorder a size up. My foot also slips sometimes off the shoe. I’ve had reefs before that have never done that. However, other than that they are super comfortable and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Reed

customer_reviews.title: These flip flop straps are entirely too tight. I ...
customer_reviews.text: These flip flop straps are entirely too tight. I don't really consider myself as having wide feet but when I put these on, I definitely started to reconsider whether I do or not! I keep trying to wear them on short trips/days where I'm not walking too much because they are starting to stretch just a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: holly settles

customer_reviews.title: They are my favorite summer shoe of all time
customer_reviews.text: This is my upteenth pair of Reef Dreams. They are my favorite summer shoe of all time. Not just a comfortable foot bed, but they have great arch support, as I have high arches. The strap between the toes doesn't hurt either.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. NP

customer_reviews.title: Great for a couple months
customer_reviews.text: Very soft. Not durable. I was glad the footbed was not slippery when wet. I wanted something I could wear to the pool without sliding, but wanted something that was easier on/off than my Tevas. These were good but didn’t even last the whole summer. They look completely worn out. The bottom of the flip flop is fine, but the footbed is worn, cracked and peeling.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Too small. Might have been Mis-sized.
customer_reviews.text: These are too small. I’ve purchased MANY Reef sandals as they are my favorite, and they all fit as expected except for this pair. I’m wondering if they were mid-sized. Too short and too tight. I put them up next to some others I have and they even look smaller.
customer_reviews.author: rachel rose

customer_reviews.title: Order a size up
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a size 6 (my always size) and had to return it cause it was way too small. Got a 7 in the mail and it fits like it should. Only complaint is they are a little tight around the top. Update: they never broke in and are very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: CA Goose

customer_reviews.title: These are some of the most comfortable shoes, feels like you are walking on a ...
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the most comfortable shoes, feels like you are walking on a cloud! I am normally a 7.5 but went with the 7 because they only come in whole sizes. My heel is right on the edge but they still fit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Kelby

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: These are my second pair. I love them so much I had to get them in a second color. They are so comfortable and hold up fairly well. My first pair (2 years old) definitely show wear, but I wore them every day for months.
customer_reviews.author: J's

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but buy half size up.
customer_reviews.text: I love Reef flip flops but found that the size 7 which I usually purchase was too small in this particular style
customer_reviews.author: Lesley-Ann LS

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Nice arch support. I have trouble with my feet, shoes are great.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable yes but sizes run smaller than usual
customer_reviews.text: Need to have more width selections. I have narrow feet and got the medium with but the fit is very very snug. Definitely can't just slip them on. Overall I would get another pair maybe even a size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Snug and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Snug and comfortable. Slightly shorter than average. Somewhat slippery foot bed. But nice comfort and support. Colors could use improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The 2nd pair I've had to buy my wife she loves the comfort.
customer_reviews.author: NateCo

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: They are wonderful!! Fit great and are the most Comfortable sandal I have ever had! Highly recommend if you are looking for comfort!
customer_reviews.author: SandiA

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and they look good
customer_reviews.text: My wife LOVES them. Super comfortable and they look good. They run just a hair small nearly right at the back of the heel with no margin for error.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love but go a size up. Seriously!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. So comfortable once broken in. I usually wear a size 6 but I couldn't even fit my foot in the sandals when they arrived so I ordered a 7. Still snug but they're molding.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Reed

customer_reviews.title: Best flip flops ever!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great - I love the arch support and the bottoms are so soft. Great if you are on your feet all day!
customer_reviews.author: Camaro Lover

customer_reviews.title: sizes run small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a half size bigger than I normally wear and they were tight.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Slaton

customer_reviews.title: By far the most comfortable sandals I’ve ever had
customer_reviews.text: By far the most comfortable sandals I’ve ever had. My daughters love mine so much I ordered them each their one pair.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love Reef's but these did not fit like the ones I buy in the store.
customer_reviews.author: Brock B.

product_meta.title: Reef Women's Dreams Sandal, Brown, 6 M US
feature_bullets: Synthetic strap lined with soft padded satin for added comfort
Rubber sponge outsole for added flexibility
Metal Reef logo detail on strap
Anatomical arch support for lasting comfort
